200.description: User has been successfully logged in.
User has been successfully logged out.
Show order by banquet id response object.

parameters.name: filter[title]
parameters.description: Can be used for searches. Is partial.

parameters.name: filter[menu_id]
parameters.description: Limits products to those that belong to menu with given id

parameters.name: filter[categories]
parameters.description:
Coma-separated array of category ids. Limits products to those
     * that have at least one of given categories attached to them

parameters.name: filter[title]
parameters.description: Can be used for searches. Is partial.

parameters.name: filter[categories]
parameters.description:
Coma-separated array of category ids. Limits services to those
     * that have at least one of given categories attached to them

parameters.name: filter[title]
parameters.description: Can be used for searches. Is partial.

parameters.name: filter[categories]
parameters.description:
Coma-separated array of category ids. Limits spaces to those
     * that have at least one of given categories attached to them

parameters.name: order_id
parameters.description: Id of current banquet's order (do not specify if order is just creating).

parameters.name: end_at
parameters.description: Must be after or equal to `start_at`. If not present then `start_at` will be taken.

parameters.name: filter[title]
parameters.description: Can be used for searches. Is partial.

parameters.name: filter[categories]
parameters.description:
Coma-separated array of category ids. Limits tickets to those
     * that have at least one of given categories attached to them

BanquetIncludes.description:
Coma-separated list of inluded relations.
    Available relations: `creator`, `customer`, `comments`, `discounts`

CustomerIncludes.description:
Coma-separated list of inluded relations.
     Available relations: `comments`, `family_members`

FamilyMemberIncludes.description:
Coma-separated list of inluded relations.
    Available relations: `relative`

MenuIncludes.description:
Coma-separated list of inluded relations.
    Available relations: `products`

OrderIncludes.description:
Coma-separated list of inluded relations. Available relations:
    `comments`, `spaces.comments`, `tickets.comments`, `products.comments`, `services.comments`

ProductIncludes.description:
Coma-separated list of inluded relations.
    Available relations: `categories`

ServiceIncludes.description:
Coma-separated list of inluded relations.
    Available relations: `categories`

SpaceIncludes.description:
Coma-separated list of inluded relations.
    Available relations: `categories`

TicketIncludes.description:
Coma-separated list of inluded relations.
    Available relations: `categories`

PageSize.description: Max number of results on page.

LoginRequest.description:
Supports login by credantials (`email` and `password`) and
    by remember token (`remember_token`).

creator_id.description: Id of the user, who created banquet.

start_at.description: Date and time of when banquet should start.

end_at.description: Date and time of when banquet should end. Must be after or equal to `start_at`.

paid_at.description: Date and time of when banquet was fully paid for.

state.description:
Banquet state available changes depends on current state.
    All states: `draft`, `new`, `processing`, `completed`, `cancelled`.

start_at.description: Date and time of when banquet should start.

end_at.description: Date and time of when banquet should end. Must be after or equal to `start_at`.

paid_at.description: Date and time of when banquet was fully paid for.

commentable_type.description: Value for it must be obrained from the target resource's type property.

force.description: Determines whether resource should be deleted without chance of restoring.

DeletedParameter.description:
Query parameter, which determines if soft-deleted records should be
    fetched from database. Available relations: `only`, `with` and `without`, which is a default one.

phone.description: Phone number may start with a plus and must contain only digits 0-9.
Phone number may start with a plus and must contain only digits 0-9.

relative_id.description: The id of the customer, who is related to this family member.
The id of the customer, who is related to this family member.

start_at.description: If not present then banquet start_at date will be used.

end_at.description: If not present then banquet end_at date will be used.

duration.description: Duration of the service rental in minutes.

password.description: This is a new password. It must be different than the current one.

current_password.description:
This is a current password. It is needed in order to perform
     authorization. Required with `password`.

available_states.description: List of states, to which banquet may be transferred.

is_editable.description: Determines if banquet can be edited.
